QuestData.Title: The Death of the Eldest
QuestData.Description: I will do what I can to stabilize him, but I will need your help.$b$bThe small amount of energy he has left is coming from the mana pool he rests in.$b$bFollow the whelplings' lead. Dropping ley crystals into the pool gives him a bit of energy - buying him a few more breaths.$b$bThey seem to be getting the crystals from inside that cave to the north.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Leyworms to obtain $1oa Crackling Leyworm Cores, then drop them into Senegos's pool.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you. Your efforts dull his pain.$b$b<She sighs.>
